verbose_text: It was also shown that fatty acids could affect the GLUT4 transporter directly while elevated plasma FA concentrations abolished insulin stimulated IRS associated phosphoinositide 3- (PI3-) kinase activity by phosphorylation of serine/threonine sites on insulin receptor substrates, which fail to associate with PI3-kinase and thus decreased activation of glucose transport.
evidence: FA concentrations abolished insulin-stimulated IRS-associated phosphoinositide 3- (PI3-) kinase activity by phosphorylation of serine/threonine sites on insulin receptor substrates, which fail to associate with PI3-kinase and thus decreased activation of glucose
